About Me

Let me tell you a few things.

BIO

Operations. Management. Hiring. Technical Recruiting. Coaching. Developing. Joseph's 7 years of professional experience have molded him into a well-rounded, organized, and essential employee . With a History Degree from Whittier College, Joseph loves to research and examine the past in order to be better prepared for current projects. He also has a Full Stack Development Certificate from The University of Texas. He is currently expanding his career in the IT Industry.

Wired Hyena LLC

Web Developer: 2018-Present

First employee for a company creating a mobile efficiency application.

Technical Recruiter
